name: The Whitaker's Library
storyline:
The Dark Story Behind The Whitaker Family...
The once-thriving Whitaker's Library has fallen on hard times, with its doors now closing due to severe financial troubles. But there's more to this decline than meets the eye—a dark story lurking in the shadows of the Whitaker family.

As the main character, you find yourself working in the library, tasked with helping to speed up the sell-off of its remaining contents. But as you carry out your duties, the unsettling truth behind James Whitaker's family downfall begins to unravel.

But as the days progress, you begin to realize that some things in this place should remain untouched.
And remember, you're only supposed to listen to instructions from James Whitaker himself.
summary:
Welcome to the Final Days of James Whitaker's Library...

You’ve taken on what seems like a simple task: helping pack up the remnants of a once-thriving library.
